javax.wsdl
Interface Service

All Superinterfaces:
AttributeExtensible, ElementExtensible, java.io.Serializable, WSDLElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceImpl
public interface Service
extends WSDLElement

This interface represents a service, which groups related ports to provide some functionality.

Author:
Paul Fremantle, Nirmal Mukhi, Matthew J. Duftler
